Name: RoadRunner VR
About the game: Run, dash and dodge your way through a chaotic road in virtual reality! Try to survive as long as possible. Use your jetpack, rocket launcher and rocks to navigate through the never-ending obstacles. RoadRunner VR can be played both sitting and standing. Fun for all the family!
